Package raymarching.shapes

Class Shape

java.lang.Object
raymarching.shapes.Shape
Direct Known Subclasses:
Box, Camera, Cone, Cylinder, Dodecahedron, Group, Light, Octahedron, Octahedron_old, Plane, Sphere, Tetrahedron, Torus
public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
A 3-dimensional volume defined by a signed distance function.

  • Field Details

    • DEFAULT_PARAMS

      public static final java.lang.String[] DEFAULT_PARAMS
      The list of parameters required by Shape's constructor. The parameters are "x", "y", "z", "scalex", "scaley", "scalez", "phi", "theta", "psi", "reflectivity", "transparency", "refrIndex".

    • PARAMS

      public static final java.lang.String[] PARAMS
      The list of additional parameters required by subclass's constructor.

    • MIN_LENGTH

      public static final double MIN_LENGTH
      The minimum size of a shape. It depends on the subclasses of Shape to limit their size by this value.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • Shape

      public Shape​(double... args)
      Creates a new Shape from args, which must match the parameters in DEFAULT_PARAMS.
      Parameters:
      args - an array or sequence of doubles representing the paramaters described in DEFAULT_PARAMS.

  • Method Details

    • getDistance

      public double getDistance​(Vector v)
      Computes the least distance from a point to the surface of the volume.
      Parameters:
      v - the point
      Returns:
      the least distance from v to the surface of the volume, which is a negative value if the point is inside the volume.

    • getLocalDistance

      protected abstract double getLocalDistance​(Vector r)

    • getNormal

      public Vector getNormal​(Vector v)
      Computes the surface normal of the shape near a point. Often can be overridden in a subclass by a more efficient and more accurate method.
      Parameters:
      v - the point
      Returns:
      the unit vector normal to the surface near v.

    • getLocalNormal

      protected Vector getLocalNormal​(Vector r)

    • getColor

      public int getColor​(Vector v)
      Returns the color of the shape near a point. Must be overriden in a sublcass to implement texture mapping.
      Parameters:
      v - the point
      Returns:
      an integer representing the color in 32-bit RGB format.

    • getLocalColor

      protected int getLocalColor​(Vector r)

    • setBoundRadius

      protected abstract double setBoundRadius()
      Computes the bound radius of the shape based on its dimensions. Called automatically as needed.
      Returns:
      the least radius of a sphere centered on the shape that completely contains it.

    • loadTexture

      public void loadTexture​(java.lang.String path) throws java.io.IOException
      Loads an image into the texture of the shape.
      Parameters:
      path - a correct path to an image file
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • setTexture

      public void setTexture​(java.awt.image.BufferedImage texture)

    • updateBoundRadius

      protected void updateBoundRadius()
      Triggers an update to the bound radius. Should be called whenever the shape's dimensions are modified.
